summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 58th Street, from 8th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8010 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
